data.client_settings: Channel: canary, Build Number: 14570, Version Hash: 6b70553727700e4e9cfe317040f4ff45fc2b4688
data.actual_result: Every other time, the Discord window will be too small and display a white bar (video: )
data.expected_result: Discord window should fill the whole desktop
data.short_description: Discord windows snapping only work every other time on Win 10 1803
data.steps_to_repro: - Grab Discord title bar and move to desktop top edge - Release mouse to snap window to fullscreen - Grab title bar again and drag down to reset window size - Repeat
